name: Primal Survivors
description:
Primal Survivos it's an insane top down shooter with unique weird creatures from this underground primal world.



Use Cards to Upgrade Your Skills


Improve your Skills and Make some DAMAGE!


True variety of Upgrades to Use!


Features
◘ 50 skills sets represented with cards for a unique experience every run!
◘ 25 permanent upgrades
◘ 2 Classes and more to come
◘ 2 Weapons and more to come
◘ 10 minutes play session for busy gamers
